architectural_notes: Enforce uniqueness for comment likes: (student_id, comment_id) must be unique to prevent multiple likes by the same student on the same comment.

existing_features.title: Surface duplicate-like errors in the UI when liking a comment, showing an English user-facing message rather than failing silently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Prevent a student from liking the same comment multiple times (enforce one like per student per comment).
Enforce a one-like-per-student-per-comment rule in the backend so the same authenticated caller cannot successfully like the same comment more than once.

projectName: Prevent duplicate likes on the same comment by the same student
